description:
Karaage (whose name means "fried chicken") is an old rooster who lives in a hen house behind http://anidb.net/ch8588 [Suzu]`s home, together with his wife and two children. He announces the sunrise to the island inhabitants every day.
Despite his humble appearance, Karaage is the Leader of the West, one of the strongest fighters on Airantou, and later becomes http://anidb.net/ch8589 [Ikuto]`s teacher for fighting skills.
name: Karaage
